entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
